product_name: Injinji RUN 2.0 Original Weight Mini-Crew Socks
long_description: Injinji RUN 2.0 Original Weight Mini-Crew socks are designed for running, but ready for anything. Original Weights are moderately-cushioned 5-toe performance socks for everyday use. Injinji RUN 2.0 Original Weight socks will take on any surface, any distance; this is your everyday go-to run sock. Anatomical 5-toe design properly aligns toes, prevents blisters and promotes proper posture and balance. Features padded heels and offers metatarsal arch support. Mesh tops provide maximum ventilation and breathability; stretchy top bands hold socks in place. CoolMax(R) fabric blend wicks moisture, dries quickly and breathes well. Heels and toes are reinforced for increased durability. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Injinji RUN 2.0 Original Weight Mini-Crew socks are designed for running, but ready for anything. Original Weights are moderately-cushioned 5-toe performance socks for everyday use.
